titleStmt.title: Great news from Lymerick in Ireland A full and true account of the state and siege of that city, by His Majesties forces, commanded by Count Solms, and Lieutenant General Douglas. With a particular relation of the surrendring of Cork and Yaughall, by the Irish.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Ireland.
